description:
You will often want to rename the columns of a DataFrame so that their names are descriptive, easy to type, and don't contain any spaces. In this video, I'll demonstrate three different strategies for renaming columns so that you can choose the best strategy to fit your particular situation.

This is video 5 of 30 in the series, `Easier data analysis in Python with pandas <http://www.dataschool.io/easier-data-analysis-with-pandas/>`__. The notebook and datasets shown in the video are available on `GitHub <https://github.com/justmarkham/pandas-videos>`__.
title: How do I rename columns in a pandas DataFrame?
